Posts.Content: Apr 8, 2014 12:48AM LittleB wrote: Hi Kjones, Thanks for starting this thread. I have an 8 yr daughter who is the apple of my eyes. the thought of leaving her without her mother just breaks my heart. I was diagnosed stage IV from the start, that will be two years ago this coming August. Just trying to make loving, meaningful memories and praying to see her graduate high school. This is my very first post. B
Posts.Title: Mothers with school aged children Kjones13 Kjones13
